SEARCH
Package courses

Class Course

java.lang.Object
courses.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Course extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a course in the educational system. The course includes information such as its unique identifier, name, description, prerequisites, schedule, lessons, teachers, and grading details. It also provides methods for managing lessons, checking prerequisites, and viewing schedules.
See Also:

      Creates a Course with the specified ID, name, and credits.

      courseID - the unique identifier for the course
      courseName - the name of the course
      credits - the number of credits for each lesson type

      courseName - the name of the course
      prerequesites - the prerequisite courses for this course
      credits - the number of credits for each lesson type

    • checkPrerequesites

      public boolean checkPrerequesites(Student student)
      Checks if the student has completed all prerequisite courses.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      true if the student has completed all prerequisites, false otherwise

    • fillLessons

      public void fillLessons(int lessonRoom, LocalDate lessonFromDate, DayOfWeek dayOfWeek, TimeWindow lessonTime, LessonType lessonType, Teacher teacher)
      Fills the course schedule with lessons for 15 weeks.
      Parameters:
      lessonRoom - the room where the lessons will be held
      lessonFromDate - the starting date of the lessons
      dayOfWeek - the day of the week for the lessons
      lessonTime - the time window for the lessons
      lessonType - the type of the lesson (e.g., lecture, lab)
      teacher - the teacher conducting the lessons
